subject: GER
title: Academic Writing
description: Writing skills do provide an important tool in the academic world and are necessary for writing essays, presentations and research papers.  However well you know your subject, it is not necessarily an easy task to talk and write about it.  Therefore this course is designed for students who want to develop or imporove their academic writing skills and presentation techniques.  The focus of the course is on processes of generating ideas, collecting information, and establishing a thesis statement.  Furthermore it also gives an introduction to the development, structure, argumentation forms, and stylistic issues of academic papers with special attention to North American usage.  This course is taught either in Waterloo or Mannheim Germany.
